entity.name: question
entity.query: SELECT question_id, question_content, title,last_modified_on, answer_count FROM Questions
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT question_id, question_content, title,last_modified_on, answer_count FROM Questions WHERE question_id=${dih.delta.id} limit 200000;
entity.deltaQuery: select question_id as id from Questions WHERE last_modified_on > '${dih.last_index_time}'

entity.name: tag_list
entity.query: SELECT Tags.tag_id AS tag_id, tag_name FROM Tags_Questions INNER JOIN Tags ON Tags.tag_id=Tags_Questions.tag_id WHERE question_id=${question.question_id}

entity.name: poster
entity.query: SELECT firstname, Users.user_id AS user_id FROM Users_Questions JOIN Users on Users.user_id=Users_Questions.user_id WHERE Users_Questions.type='POST' AND Users_Questions.question_id=${question.question_id}
